title: USA TODAY Logic Puzzles: 200 Puzzles from The Nation's No. 1 Newspaper (USA Today Puzzles)
description: The Nation's Newspaper offers puzzle-smiths the ultimate book featuring a new collection of challenging conundrums.This collection is all about variety. A puzzler's choice of five games-Domino Search, Battleships, Pile Up, ABC, and Logi-5-are offered under one cover."You can be sitting in the train working a puzzle but it can take you far away from the everyday. Before you know it you're at your stop or about to pass it. It's not like you were even in the train. It's something different, something removed from the ordinary." â€”Maki Kaji, The Japanese Times
author: USA Today
